snippet: Giorgi Gogia of the group Human Rights Watch had planned to attend hearings in court cases of two other rights advocates.
abstract: Azerbaijan bars Giorgi Gogia of Human Rights Watch from entering country, in latest move that international rights advocates have scored.
lead_paragraph: Giorgi Gogia of the group Human Rights Watch had planned to attend hearings in court cases of two other rights advocates.

headline.main: Azerbaijan Bars Entry to a Georgian Human Rights Worker
headline.print_headline: Azerbaijan Bars Entry to a Georgian Human Rights Worker

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
